I am an applied statistician with a specific interest in statistical modeling applied to ecology and environment. 

My research focus on the **statistical integration of heterogeneous datasets to infer spatio-temporal ecological and environmental processes**. My main fields of application are species distribution  modeling, marine ecology, geography and micro-climate of urban areas.
